Description: Up for grabs is a lightly used and affordable EVH Wolfgang electric in a smooth snow white finish. The neck is super smooth and fast playing! This guitar is used and in good shape. There is a Star Wars sticker on the top of the body. See pics for full cosmetic details. Serialized ice1700658 No case included 7lbs 13oz The EVH Wolfgang WG Standard boasts the same style and massive sound Eddie Van Halen created at a price the everyday musician can afford. Offering many of the premium features as its more expensive brethren, the Wolfgang WG Standard has a basswood body with special “comfort cut” forearm contour for maximum playing ease, maple top, two-piece bolt-on maple neck with graphite reinforcement rods to hold strong against the ravages of temperature and humidity, a convenient truss rod adjust spoke wheel at the base of the neck, and a speedy 12”-16” compound radius maple fingerboard with comfortably rolled edges and 22 jumbo frets. Bridge and neck position EVH Wolfgang humbucking pickups are mounted directly to the body and increase resonance transfer, resulting in sustain for days on end. This axe is also equipped with two domed control knobs that have been dialed-in to Van Halen’s exacting specifications, including a smooth-feeling 500k volume pot that makes it easy to find a unique sound while retaining the crisp high-end sparkle of the EVH Wolfgang pickups. The EVH-branded Floyd Rose Special bridge and R2 locking nut consistently stay in tune through the deepest whammy dives and horse whinnies. Decked out for playing performance and comfort, the Wolfgang WG Standard is available in Transparent Black or Snow White. The Transparent Black model features off-natural body binding, a black headstock and black chrome hardware; the Snow White features black hardware and a black headstock. Body Material: Basswood Inlays: Dots Number of Frets: 22 Scale Length: 25.5 inches Nut Width: 1.635 inches Neck Material: Maple Fretboard Material: Maple Finish/Color: Snow White Bridge Pickup: EVH Wolfgang Humbucking Neck Pickup: EVH Wolfgang Humbucking Case: None
Title: 2017 EVH Wolfgang Standard Electric Guitar Snow White (USED)
